scenes.text: You wake up on a large golden throne surrounded by a buffet full of exotic cheeses and spread across the stone floor were shiny golden coins.

You chose to enjoy a nice meal of cheese. After eating your 511th slice of cheese, you begin to notice a squeaking sound coming from the walls... Hundreds of mice start pouring out from a hole in the wall!

choices.text: Give them cheese as a peace offering

scenes.text: Quick! Make a move before he does!
You ignored the cheese and started picking up coin after coin. You gained a total of 3 gold coins.
You thought it would be a good idea to jump out the window...? As your body falls through the sky, you see two possible landing spots.
You're also starting to feel a large pain coming from your left leg. It's probably broken. And now you also see a large crocodile swimming towards you. What do you do?
After a while, the croc leaves you outside a hut made out of mud and twigs. The door to the hut automatically opens upon your arrival and before you stands a witch!

choices.text: She looks so hideous you try to pay her to go away

scenes.text: After you are done with the room, you make your way down the castle's large stairway. Finally arriving at the castle's courtyard, you notice two groups of people: a young beautiful lady and some guards patrolling the grounds. Which one do you approach?
She looks you up and down with a worrying face. How will you sweep her off her feet?

choices.text: Wink and offer a gold coin
Thy bottom is rounder than thy apple

scenes.text: The guards look at you with suspicion. How do you get out of the tricky situation?

choices.text: Convince them you are also a guard

endings.text: Marriage Ending: She signs the contract thinking she married rich, though little did she know you only had two gold coins left to your name.
Beggar Ending: They think you are a beggar who has wandered into the castle by mistake. They pick you up and throw you into the street below the castle.
Prison Ending: They knock you out cold and when you wake up you are in a prison cell.
Freedom Ending: The guards run away screaming in fear. You are now free to leave the castle!
Blessed Ending: Disgusted by your wounds, she heals you and also gives you a wonderful huge mustache!
Cursed Ending: The curse turned you into a bald walking stick...
Garry Ending: You continue to pretend being their great friend Garry for all eternity...
You Are a Wizard Harry Ending: Your first mission as a powerful witch apprentice is to sweep the floor.
Death Ending: You died an awful death surrounded by cheese and stinky mice...
